column1: #Text=" Chong says : " The curse says that only those who trust in love can make it through the caves .
#Text=Otherwise , you 'll be trapped in them forever .
#Text=" Chong says : " Oh yeah , and die .
#Text=Hey , I just remembered the rest of that song !
#Text=There 's no way we 're going through some cursed hole !
#Text=" Moku says : " Hey , someone 's making a big campfire !
#Text=" Katara says : " That 's no campfire , Moku .
#Text=" Aang says : " So all you need to do is trust in love to get through these caves ?
#Text=" Chong says : " That is correct , Master Arrowhead .
#Text=" Aang says : " We can make it .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Everyone into the hole !
#Text=The mountain will take care of the rest .
